# Sample Markdown Document

This is a sample Markdown document for testing the md-to-pdf converter.

## Features

- Headings
- **Bold text**
- *Italic text*
- Lists
  - Nested lists
- [Links](https://example.com)

## Code Blocks

```python
def hello_world():
    print("Hello, world!")
```

## Tables

| Header 1 | Header 2 |
|----------|----------|
| Cell 1   | Cell 2   |
| Cell 3   | Cell 4   |

## Math (if supported)

$$E = mc^2$$
